errors: FINRA consolidatedShortInterest data are only available for specific settlement dates (typically the 15th and month-end). Queries directly on 2025-06-15 and nearby non-reporting dates (e.g., 2025-06-16) returned errors, so 2025-06-13 was used as the closest available settlement date with data for all symbols.
